Category: Top‑level grouping (Customer & Support, Marketing & Sales, Business Systems, Industry Solutions, Growth Systems).
Description: Short value proposition and scope of the service.
Target Audiences: Primary buyer/user segments this service targets.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps: Exact step‑by‑step instructions to configure the service inside SuiteDash.
Integrations/Tools: External tools/platforms used and how they connect (BOS bundle).

Description: Branded secure portal for clients to access projects, files, invoices, and support.
Target Audiences: Business Owners, Operations Managers, Professional Services, Consultants
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Enable Secure Client Portal and apply branding.
2. Create Circles/roles; assign access permissions per client.
3. Set up File/Folder Templates and auto-generate per client.
4. Build onboarding Flow + welcome email automation.
5. Enable Support Tickets inside the portal; configure notifications.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash (Portal, Files, Tickets), Make (optional webhooks), Email (SuiteDash/SMTP)

Description: Embed an AI chatbot to answer FAQs, escalate to tickets, and capture leads 24/7.
Target Audiences: IT Service Providers, Customer Support Teams, E‑commerce, SaaS
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Compile FAQs in Wiki/KB for AI source of truth.
2. Embed AI chat widget in portal pages.
3. Configure fallback: AI posts to SuiteDash via Email-to-Ticket.
4. Set Make webhook to tag/route escalations to teams.
5. Review transcripts weekly; update KB.
Integrations/Tools: AI Chatbot (vendor of choice), SuiteDash Tickets (Email‑to‑Ticket), Make (router), ActiveCampaign (tagging)

Description: Self-serve appointment booking with reminders and calendar sync.
Target Audiences: Sales Teams, Consultants, Healthcare Teams, Home Services
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Create Appointment Types (duration, buffers, location).
2. Set staff availability schedules per type.
3. Publish booking form (Kickoff Form) and portal widget.
4. Enable confirmations and reminders; test workflows.
5. Sync calendars via iCal or Make to Google/Outlook.

Description: Kanban pipeline with stage-based tasks, reminders, and revenue forecasting.
Target Audiences: Business Owners, Sales Managers, Agencies, Real Estate
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Define Pipelines and Deal Stages in CRM.
2. Create stage-change automations (tasks, emails, assignments).
3. Set lead routing rules (owner, territory, round robin).
4. Build proposal & e‑signature templates; link to pipeline.
5. Enable dashboards for value/probability forecasting.

Description: Newsletters and drip sequences for prospects and customers.
Target Audiences: Marketing Teams, Business Owners, E‑commerce, IT Providers
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Create Audiences/segments from CRM contacts.
2. Configure SMTP/sender identity and templates.
3. Build campaigns and drip automations; map triggers.
4. Integrate ActiveCampaign for advanced flows.
5. Track opens/clicks and iterate content.

Description: Capture leads via forms/landing pages and auto‑nurture to opportunity.
Target Audiences: Marketing, Agencies, Professional Services, Real Estate
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Publish Kickoff Forms; embed on website/LPs.
2. Auto‑acknowledge with email; create CRM Deal.
3. Notify sales; assign follow‑up task within 24h.
4. Start drip sequence; apply source/UTM tags.
5. Escalate dormant leads with timed reminders.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Forms/CRM, Make (FB/Google Lead Ads sync), ActiveCampaign, TruConversion/SalesPanel (scoring)

Description: No‑code trigger→action rules to eliminate repetitive tasks and handoffs.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Document process; define triggers, actions, delays.
2. Implement automations (e.g., invoice paid → status change).
3. Create task templates & checklists; assign owners.
4. Use Flows for guided, multi‑step procedures.
5. Log automation outcomes; refine exceptions.

Description: Courses, lessons, and quizzes for staff/clients with auto‑enrollment.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Enable LMS; create Courses/Modules/Lessons.
2. Upload media; add quizzes/certificates.
3. Auto‑enroll via triggers (new staff, deal won, purchase).
4. Set reminders and completion actions.
5. Track progress; report by team/franchise.

Description: KPIs and trend widgets fed from invoices and external systems.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Define metrics (MRR, AR, on‑time delivery).
2. Wire data sources (SuiteDash, QBO, Sheets).
3. Build dashboard widgets & charts in portal.
4. Schedule nightly data refresh via Make.
5. Set threshold alerts (overdue, targets met).
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Invoices/Dashboards, QuickBooks/Xero, Google Sheets, Make/AITable

Description: APIs + automation to sync SuiteDash with accounting, email, POS, etc.
Target Audiences: IT Service Providers, Ops/IT, Multi‑tool orgs
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Inventory apps; define data flows & field mapping.
2. Create Make/n8n workflows; secure credentials.
3. Configure SuiteDash webhooks/API triggers.
4. Test end‑to‑end with seed records; add retries.
5. Document runs; set error notifications.

Description: Unified funnel from awareness → referral with automated handoffs.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Map funnel stages to CRM/segments.
2. Implement multi‑channel lead capture & tagging.
3. Automate nurturing and MQL→SQL transitions.
4. Trigger onboarding on ‘Won’ deals; upsell sequences.
5. Referral capture & attribution; KPI dashboard.

Description: Company‑wide SuiteDash implementation as single source of truth.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Configure core modules (CRM, Projects, Billing, Portal).
2. Model org structure with roles/circles/workspaces.
3. Migrate data; standardize templates & SOPs.
4. Cross‑dept automations for handoffs.
5. Train teams; iterate quarterly.

Description: Rapid ‘mini‑BOS’: CRM, Portal, and basic billing in days.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Requirements blitz; prioritize must‑haves.
2. Spin up simplified CRM pipeline & tasks.
3. Brand client portal; publish core pages.
4. Enable invoicing & payment gateway.
5. Record a 1‑hour team onboarding video.

Description: End‑to‑end project templates, document control, and milestone alerts.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Create project templates with phased tasks.
2. Set folder structures (blueprints, permits).
3. Grant client/sub access via circles; restrict views.
4. Automate phase completions & deadline reminders.
5. Embed inspection scheduling & daily site reports.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Files/Portal, Make (weather/API), Calendars, QBO (job costing)

Description: Production scheduling, QC checkpoints, and WIP dashboards.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Map order→production→QC→shipping to tasks/projects.
2. Auto‑create QC tasks; capture pass/fail & notes.
3. Sync inventory/POS via Make; trigger POs.
4. Build production KPIs dashboard; track OTD%.
5. Schedule preventive maintenance as recurring tasks.
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Projects/Tasks, Inventory/ERP via Make, Google Sheets/Looker

Description: Multi‑location portal, reporting, training, and support hub.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Model franchises as Companies/Circles; limit data scope.
2. Build franchise portal: resources, forum, support.
3. Automate weekly/monthly KPI submissions via forms.
4. Roll‑up dashboards for HQ; local dashboards for units.
5. Assign LMS curricula; track compliance & expirations.
